arStrings.szText: When you use a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill that changes your form, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
Using a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill grants {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life or {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
